title: Perusu
overview: After Finding Their Father Dead, and to Their Dismay, His Two Sons Discover That Something in Him is Still Alive. What Should Have Been a Day of Somber Mourning Breaks Into a Complete Bedlam as the Two Sons Try, as Discreetly as Possible to Do the Funeral. In Their Quest to Accomplish the Funeral the Two Brothers Are Forced to Confront Their Own Troubled Relationship and Deal With Their Dead Father.
